chapter.title: References
chapter.para: This design is based on Ka-Ping Yee's Roundup design, submitted to the Software Carpentry sc-track competitions. Yee's design is described in his first round and second round submissions.

This design also draws ideas from other Software Carpentry design submissions, including John Martin's EGad and Alex Samuel's and Mark Mitchell's TotalTrack. Additional suggestions are drawn from discussions help on the Software Carpentry sc-discuss mailing list.

Other major Open Source or free software bug tracking systems include,
GNATS, The GNU Bug Tracking System
Bugzilla
Jitterbug
Web directories such as Google list others.
David Eaton's Problem Management Tools Summary page includes links to many commercial and non-commercial systems. ClearDDTS is another interesting commercial system, as are Yeast and Provence.
The comp.software.config-mgmt &faq; has an issue tracking section.
